lead_paragraph: Poland have an impressive defensive record at Euro 2016 but standing in their way to a semi-final spot is arguably one of sport's greatest-ever athletes, Cristiano Ronaldo.

headline.print_headline: Ronaldo Poses Biggest Threat Yet to Polish Rearguard
headline.main: Ronaldo Poses Biggest Threat Yet to Polish Rearguard
